 Applets




 Overview
 User Interface
 Event Listeners
 Graphics and MediaPainting[edit]By overriding the update(Graphics g) and paint(Graphics g) methods of an Applet (or one of it's sub-components), you can have fairly direct control over the rendering of an Applet. The Graphics object provides various primitives for working for two-dimensional graphics.
